name: git-summary
description: Generate summaries of git commits using OpenAI's GPT models

gitSummary.timeRange.description: Time range for commit history (e.g., '1 week', '2 days', '1 month')

gitSummary.author.description: Filter commits by author (empty for all authors)

gitSummary.model.description: OpenAI model to use for summary generation. Can be a predefined model or a custom model identifier

gitSummary.baseURL.description: Custom base URL for OpenAI API (empty for default OpenAI endpoint)

gitSummary.outputPath.description: Custom output path for summary files (empty for workspace root)

enumDescriptions: Only use commit subjects for summary generation
Use full commit diffs for summary generation
Generate two summaries: one based on subjects and one based on diffs
gitSummary.summaryMode.description: What information to use for generating the summary

gitSummary.maxCodeChanges.description: Maximum number of lines of code changes to include in the summary
